root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 4-1-3, translated into en
root.data:
- Number of students studying at lower secondary level in school year t; number of students aged 11-14 years old studying at lower secondary school in school year t: Compiled from the form 03-High School-DN, promulgated by the Education and Training sector statistical reporting system. Periodically, the Departments of Education and Training of the provinces/cities directly under the Central Government collect information in the form 02-TH-DN and send it to the Ministry of Education and Training.

- Population aged 11-14 years in school year t: Collected through censuses of the General Statistics Office.

- The Ministry of Education and Training compiles data on the number of students studying at lower secondary level in school year t; number of students aged 11-14 years old studying at lower secondary school in school year t and population data from 11-14 years old from the General Statistics Office to calculate this indicator.
